description: Luxury Town Houses with 'The Row on French'. This unit is in Building 4. This project is located in a quiet and beautiful area, in the heart of Marpole. Located minutes away from Oakridge Park, restaurants, golf courses and parks. Featuring a stunning kitchen with soft-close cabinetry, high end Bosch Stainless appliances from Bosch, a gas cook top, and quartz counters. The units heating system is a heat pump, which allows you to enjoy air conditioning during the warm months. This unit has 1 parking and 1 storage room in the secured underground garage. Call us for a viewing of this amazing project.
